metadata.Title: CVE-2013-5919 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Suricata before 1.4.6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a malformed SSL record.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-5919` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

suricata - 1.4.7-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: suricata package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.7-1ubuntu1').
